name: Canonical phone number
description: Will match any canonical phone number, supports most of the international phone numbers, dont use it if you want a strict american or canadian number. ^(?:\+[\s]*(?=(?:\d{1,3}))(?:\d{1,3})|[\s]\d{1,3})?[\s]*(?:[(][\s]*\d{1,6}\s*[)])[\s]*(?:\d{1,6}[\s-.]*)*(?:(?::|x)[\s]*(?=(?:\d{1,4}))\d{1,4}[\s]*)?(?<![-.])$/gix
author: Sai
